description: As they decorate their tree and stage their gifts, Darin Silvers & Gunner can feel the holiday spirit in the air, but it looks like they'll both be on the naughty list after their exploits on the sofa. Darin is hung with care, but he's thinking about stuffing a lot more than stockings, and luckily for him, Gunner has the perfect place for his yule log. He climbs aboard Darin's candy cane and gives him a holiday joy ride, before spreading his legs and letting Darin open up his gift a little early. Early forecasts suggest a 100% chance it will be a white Christmas for both of them.Enjoy!
title: Playin' With Balls
